## serialization.ISerializer.clear() method

Clears the state of the plugin or system.

**Signature:**

```typescript
clear(workspace: Workspace): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  workspace | [Workspace](./blockly.workspace.md) | The workspace the system to clear the state of is associated with. |

**Returns:**

void
